amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title), insert the following: SEC.___. None of the funds made available by this Act may be obligated or expended pursuant to the Authorization for Use of Military Force (Public Law 107-40; 50 U.S.C. 1541 note) after December 31, 2014.
amendment.purpose: An amendment No. 34 printed in the Congressional Record to prohibit use of funds to be obligated or expended pursuant to the Authorization for Use of Military of Force after December 31, 2014.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Lee (CA) amendment (A056) Failed by recorded vote: 157 - 260 (Roll no. 330).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Lee (CA) amendment (A056) Failed by recorded vote: 157 - 260 (Roll no. 330).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A056) offered by Ms. Lee (CA).
